```{r, echo=FALSE, results = "asis", message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
topics <- chapters$CHAPTERKEY
for(topic in topics) {
#  topic <- topics[2]
  make.chapter(topic)
      
  cat("  \n")
#  if (!knitr:::is_html_output()) cat("\\vfill")
  
  if(topic != "Wprowadzenie") {
     titles <- songs[songs$CHAPTERKEY == topic,]$BIBTEXKEY
      for(title in titles) {
        make.song(title)
      }
    }
  }
```
